Title: Relates to requiring a firearms safety course for a license to carry, possess, repair or dispose of a firearm
Summary: Requires a forty hour firearm safety course for a license to carry, possess, repair or dispose of a firearm; makes certain exceptions for certain individuals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to requiring a firearms safety course for a license to carry, possess, repair or dispose of a firearm
